name: Kraken
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Amphibious: The kraken can breathe air and water.
traits.Freedom of Movement: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.
traits.Siege Monster: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.
